hero.title: Logistics solutions without borders
hero.subtitle: Since 1997, Elite Cargo has been your expert partner in air freight, customs transit, and logistics, connecting West Africa to the world with reliability and excellence.

about.title: About Us
about.text1: Elite Cargo is a leading group in air freight and logistics in West Africa. Our 25+ years of expertise in air freight enables us to provide comprehensive and customized logistics solutions to our clients.
about.text2: Our strength lies in our extensive network of strategically positioned subsidiaries in Guinea, Senegal, Mali, Sierra Leone, and Benin. This regional presence allows us to ensure optimal coverage and proximity service. Our team of qualified professionals, combined with our modern infrastructure, enables us to guarantee excellence in service and maximum customer satisfaction.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Discover our complete range of air freight and logistics services tailored to your needs

freight.title: Air Freight
freight.description: Complete freight management on major airlines with optimized tracking and security.

customs.title: Customs & Transit
customs.description: Customs formalities, import/export transit, specialized documentation on demand.

moving.title: Moving
moving.description: Complete solutions for professional and personal international relocations.
